candidates.title: Release 0.0.23
candidates.body:
Changes:
- workflows: limit permissions to reading repo contents
- rpm_ostree/deploy: block on driver registration
- docs/images: update actor graph with D-Bus actor
- update_agent: put agent state behind a RwLock
- update_agent: remove unused `Result`s
- update_agent: misc cleanup
- update_agent: put state behind `Rc` instead of `Arc`
- update_agent: split state_changed out of UpdateAgentInfo
- update_agent: use `Cell` for `state_changed` field
- dist/config.d/*.toml: Add missing EOL

candidates.title: build(deps): bump futures from 0.3.15 to 0.3.16
candidates.body:
Bumps [futures](https://github.com/rust-lang/futures-rs) from 0.3.15 to 0.3.16.
Release notes

Sourced from futures's releases.

0.3.16

  • Add TryStreamExt::try_chunks (#2438)
  • Add StreamExt::{all, any} (#2460)
  • Add stream::select_with_strategy (#2450)
  • Update to new io_slice_advance interface (#2454)
Changelog

Sourced from futures's changelog.

0.3.16 - 2021-07-23

  • Add TryStreamExt::try_chunks (#2438)
  • Add StreamExt::{all, any} (#2460)
  • Add stream::select_with_strategy (#2450)
  • Update to new io_slice_advance interface (#2454)

candidates.title: build(deps): bump tokio from 1.8.2 to 1.9.0
candidates.body:
Bumps [tokio](https://github.com/tokio-rs/tokio) from 1.8.2 to 1.9.0.
Release notes

Sourced from tokio's releases.

Tokio v1.9.0

1.9.0 (July 19, 2021)

Added

  • net: allow customized I/O operations for TcpStream (#3888)
  • sync: add getter for the mutex from a guard (#3928)
  • task: expose nameable future for TaskLocal::scope (#3273)

Fixed

  • Fix leak if output of future panics on drop (#3967)
  • Fix leak in LocalSet (#3978)

Changes

  • runtime: reorganize parts of the runtime (#3909, #3939, #3950, #3955, #3980)
  • sync: clean up OnceCell (#3945)
  • task: remove mutex in JoinError (#3959)

#3273: tokio-rs/tokio#3273 #3888: tokio-rs/tokio#3888 #3909: tokio-rs/tokio#3909 #3928: tokio-rs/tokio#3928 #3934: tokio-rs/tokio#3934 #3939: tokio-rs/tokio#3939 #3945: tokio-rs/tokio#3945 #3950: tokio-rs/tokio#3950 #3955: tokio-rs/tokio#3955 #3959: tokio-rs/tokio#3959 #3967: tokio-rs/tokio#3967 #3978: tokio-rs/tokio#3978 #3980: tokio-rs/tokio#3980

Commits
  • b280c6d chore: prepare Tokio v1.9.0 (#3961)
  • 998dc5a task: fix leak in LocalSet (#3978)
  • ced7992 runtime: add large test and fix leak it found (#3967)
  • 0cefa85 runtime: make scheduler non-optional (#3980)
  • 2087f3e runtime: rework binding of new tasks (#3955)
  • 5ae2855 io: fix docs referring to clear_{read,write}_ready (#3957)
  • 2520048 sync: add getter for the mutex from a guard (#3928)
  • 549e89e chore: use the loom mutex wrapper everywhere (#3958)
  • c8fc492 Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/tokio-1.8.x' into merge-1.8
  • 7c4183a runtime: drop future when polling cancelled future (#3965)
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://dependabot-badges.githubapp.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=tokio&package-manager=cargo&previous-version=1.8.2&new-version=1.9.0)](https://docs.github.com/en/github/managing-security-vulnerabilities/about-dependabot-security-updates#about-compatibility-scores) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. candidates.title: build(deps): bump fn-error-context from 0.1.2 to 0.2.0
candidates.body:
Bumps [fn-error-context](https://github.com/andrewhickman/fn-error-context) from 0.1.2 to 0.2.0.
Changelog

Sourced from fn-error-context's changelog.

0.2.0

  • Fix some borrow checker errors with synchronous functions, and add the #[context(move, "context")] syntax to support functions which consume their arguments. Thanks to @​KaiJewson for #5.
Commits
  • 082a7c6 Prepare for version 0.2.0
  • 60d3984 Add test for using owned argument in async fn
  • 5b1b9db Use mixed-site hygiene on all locals
  • 4f5ef04 Force the closure to be FnOnce
  • d01c58e Add support for move option
  • abc3e4d Use async move block to fix borrowing issues
  • 6743972 Upgrade to GitHub-native Dependabot

candidates.title: Release 0.0.22
candidates.body:
Changes:
 * lockfile: general refresh, update all openssl crates
 * Add more metrics around finalization attempts
 * workflows: bump MSRV and lints toolchain
 * update_agent: promote some log messages to INFO level
 * update_agent: slow down end state tick cadence
 * dist: fix dbus configuration

chosen_pr.title: build(deps): bump tokio from 1.8.2 to 1.9.0
chosen_pr.body:
Bumps [tokio](https://github.com/tokio-rs/tokio) from 1.8.2 to 1.9.0.
Release notes

Sourced from tokio's releases.

Tokio v1.9.0

1.9.0 (July 19, 2021)

Added

  • net: allow customized I/O operations for TcpStream (#3888)
  • sync: add getter for the mutex from a guard (#3928)
  • task: expose nameable future for TaskLocal::scope (#3273)

Fixed

  • Fix leak if output of future panics on drop (#3967)
  • Fix leak in LocalSet (#3978)

Changes

  • runtime: reorganize parts of the runtime (#3909, #3939, #3950, #3955, #3980)
  • sync: clean up OnceCell (#3945)
  • task: remove mutex in JoinError (#3959)

#3273: tokio-rs/tokio#3273 #3888: tokio-rs/tokio#3888 #3909: tokio-rs/tokio#3909 #3928: tokio-rs/tokio#3928 #3934: tokio-rs/tokio#3934 #3939: tokio-rs/tokio#3939 #3945: tokio-rs/tokio#3945 #3950: tokio-rs/tokio#3950 #3955: tokio-rs/tokio#3955 #3959: tokio-rs/tokio#3959 #3967: tokio-rs/tokio#3967 #3978: tokio-rs/tokio#3978 #3980: tokio-rs/tokio#3980

Commits
  • b280c6d chore: prepare Tokio v1.9.0 (#3961)
  • 998dc5a task: fix leak in LocalSet (#3978)
  • ced7992 runtime: add large test and fix leak it found (#3967)
  • 0cefa85 runtime: make scheduler non-optional (#3980)
  • 2087f3e runtime: rework binding of new tasks (#3955)
  • 5ae2855 io: fix docs referring to clear_{read,write}_ready (#3957)
  • 2520048 sync: add getter for the mutex from a guard (#3928)
  • 549e89e chore: use the loom mutex wrapper everywhere (#3958)
  • c8fc492 Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/tokio-1.8.x' into merge-1.8
  • 7c4183a runtime: drop future when polling cancelled future (#3965)
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://dependabot-badges.githubapp.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=tokio&package-manager=cargo&previous-version=1.8.2&new-version=1.9.0)](https://docs.github.com/en/github/managing-security-vulnerabilities/about-dependabot-security-updates#about-compatibility-scores) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself.
